question.title: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver error
question.body:
I have created new project in eclipse and getting the error as 'java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver' while running the application.

**org.apache.jasper.JasperException: An exception occurred processing [logincheckadmin.jsp] at line [16]
13: String pass = request.getParameter("Enter Password");
14: 
15: %>
16: <% if(credcheck.checkDetails(name, pass))
17: {
18:     out.println("Welcome Mr."+name);
19:     session.setAttribute("message", name); 
Stacktrace:

    org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.TaskThread$WrappingRunnable.run(TaskThread.java:63)
    java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1575)
Root Cause
jakarta.servlet.ServletException: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver

I have configured the jdbc jar file under classpath for the new project. Still its not working. But its working for the old projects i have created earlier
